data.name: Funny Pets
data.detailed_description:
In this cute Match-3 game a terrible tornado carried away all the funny pets! Help them to find the way to their small town Petsville. Make longest possible chains of similar pets to get exciting bonuses. Form the chain of three or more pets of the same color by clicking at one animal and swipe to other adjacent animals of the same color and all of them will disappear. If there is a stone tile under the pet from the chain it will be destroyed.

* 120 levels
* 3 Game modes - Moves, Timed and Relaxed
* Spectacular bonuses
* Lovable pets of all varieties

data.short_description: In this cute Match-3 game a terrible tornado carried away all the funny pets! Help them to find the way to their small town Petsville
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Device
